Description: 1 Bed apartment with Gleaming Hardwood Floors, New Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite Counter Tops, Dishwasher, Newly Renovated Bathroom, one with Bath Tub and another one with Shower. Huge living room with plenty of windows and great view of the Boston and neighboring cities. Balcony of the Living room. Open floor plan with exposed brick in the Kitchen. 1 Off Street Parking is included. Cats are accepted. The move-in cost is low, only First Month, Last Month, application and 1 Month Brokers Fees. Beautiful Apartment to call you home. Hurry, Won't Last!! Disclaimer: Picture/video are of a similar unit in the building.
